summary: Responsive, mobile-first fun web simulator called "Insta Follower Hook" that mimics an Instagram follower "hook" game (no real follower service), with a home form, fake 60-second processing, random outcome messages, and informational pages including a prominent disclaimer.
architectural_notes: Pure frontend-only implementation (HTML/CSS/JS); no backend and no real API calls.
Client-side random outcome logic after a fixed 60-second simulated processing delay.
Username-only input; do not request or store passwords.
Include clear, prominent disclaimer content stating this is a simulator/game for entertainment only.
known_issues: Deployment to production failed with a deployment error; user requested retry.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, mobile-first Home page for the game named "Insta Follower Hook" with: (1) a large title "Insta Follower Hook", (2) subtitle "Try Your Luck ‚Äì Get Free Instagram Followers (Just for Fun)", (3) a text-only input labeled "Instagram Username" (do not request or accept any password), (4) a follower amount selector offering exactly: 100, 200, 500, 1000, 5000, 10000, and (5) a primary button labeled "Get Followers".

Implement the fake processing flow on "Get Followers" click: show a loading state containing the text "Processing your request‚Ä¶ Please wait 60 seconds" and display a 60-second progress indicator (progress bar or spinner) that lasts 60 seconds, then randomly show exactly ONE result message from the following list: (a) "‚ùå Please try again after some time" (b) "‚ö†Ô∏è Server busy, come back later" (c) "üéâ Congratulations! Followers added successfully (Game Result)".

Add site navigation (menu) that provides routes/pages for: Home, How It Works, Disclaimer, About Us, Contact, and a Privacy Policy page to support the footer link. Navigation must be usable on mobile (e.g., collapsed menu/hamburger or stacked links) and desktop.

Create a prominent Disclaimer page that clearly states (verbatim, line breaks optional): "This website is only a game / simulator. We do NOT provide real Instagram followers. We do NOT collect passwords. This is made for entertainment and fun purposes only."

Create a How It Works page that lists the following steps in order (wording may match exactly): Step 1: Enter your Instagram username; Step 2: Select followers amount; Step 3: Click Get Followers; Step 4: Wait and see the game result.

Apply an Instagram-style visual design across the app: pink/purple gradient accents, clean card-based layout, clear buttons, and mobile-first spacing/typography. Fun emojis may be used in UI copy without reducing readability.
Add a global footer visible across pages with the exact text "Insta Follower Hook ¬© 2026 | Just a Fun Game" and include footer links to Disclaimer and Privacy Policy pages.

Ensure the application performs no real Instagram follower actions: do not call external APIs, do not collect/store passwords, and do not require any backend functionality for the simulator logic (random outcome and timer must be client-side only).

Resolve the production deployment error so the app can be successfully deployed, then perform a fresh production deployment retry. Identify the root cause of the previous deployment failure (build/bundle errors, canister configuration issues, frontend asset build issues, or backend canister build issues) and apply the minimal code/config changes needed to make deployment succeed without changing existing app behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build responsive Home page UI with title/subtitle, username input (text only), follower amount selector (100‚Äì10000), and "Get Followers" button
Implement fake processing flow: 60-second loading/progress indicator and random result message after completion
Add site navigation and pages: Home, How It Works, Disclaimer, About Us, Contact
Create prominent Disclaimer page stating it is only a game/simulator, no real followers, no password collection, entertainment only
Create How It Works page with step-by-step instructions for the simulator
Apply Instagram-style visual design (pink/purple gradient), clean card/button UI, mobile-first responsive layout, fun emojis allowed
Add footer with "Insta Follower Hook ¬© 2026 | Just a Fun Game" plus links to Disclaimer and Privacy Policy
Implement as pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript with no backend, no real API calls, and JS-only random result logic
